description: Awardit AB provides membership clubs, and loyalty and self motivation programs. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 55 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2017-12-05. The firm offers a one-stop shop and assists with strategy for the initiative, set-up, technical and operational service. The core of the business consists of a platform, which enables the set-up and operation of loyalty programs as a cloud service. Also, the Company functions as bank for digital scoring currencies and provides everything from independent loyalty programs to complex alliance programs with hundreds of partners and clearing of transactions between them. The firm operates within such product segments as Loyalty program B2C, Loyalty program B2B, Motivation program and Rewardit.
naics: Management, Scientific, and Technical Consulting Services
name: Awardit AB publ
